website_summaries.verdict: A basic soft hot tub cover that isn’t as durable as vinyl options but still protects against the elements.
pros: Constructed of 600D polyester fabric with water-resistant backing
Protects against sun, rain, snow, dirt, and debris
Features multiple locking systems, including adjustable buckles
cons: May not last quite as long as advertised
Can come loose in the wind

customer_reviews.title: Sliders help make a custom, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover hoping it would work for my 78”x72” spa. The cover is heavy duty, attractive, and the sliders help make a “custom” fit. I’m very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: 72Nova

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: It fits my HotSprings Vanguard nicely. I have to weigh it down on the windward side because it does catch the wind. The spa tapers in from the bottom to the top so that doesn’t help hold it on. As for the bad, the first time I cinched the smaller strap on the front of the cover the stitching ripped out. It is still completely usable though. UPDATE: Please be careful when opening tub while top is frozen. I ripped my cover when I grabbed it to shake off the icy buildup. It was frozen to the hot tub cover and I ignored caution. However, I am getting another one because I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: DougMart

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: POS. Covered our jacuzzi cover with this while we went on a 1 month vacation this summer. Yes we live in the desert but you’d think the product would have lasted a whole 39 days in the sun.... nope. The band around the cover completely disintegrated and the lining acted as a bonder between this cover and the sides of the jacuzzi. Not recommended. I feel like a blue tarp would have done better and cost way less.
customer_reviews.author: s.kittyCA

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed pretty good at first and held up just fine for about 5 months. After that it became extremely brittle and has now become torn while removing it from the tub. This is very disappointing because I was expecting that for the price I paid that this might last a little longer. Now I’m back to searching for a better quality cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof cover
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice! Very easy to put on and secure with the great straps. It came quickly and fit perfectly my 85by85 hot tub. Now I don’t have to keep sucking rain water out that seeps in the new hard cover that I have when my hot tub is empty . What a relief. The material is thick and will last a long time and protect the hard cover from our hot summer sun.
customer_reviews.author: nola girl

customer_reviews.title: Works to protect preexisting cover from sun damage
customer_reviews.text: We put it over our preexisting cover for the summer. Keeps the sun from damaging the expensive cover when were not using the hot tub here in Phoenix . My pool water is almost hot tub temperature @ 90° . Suprising its not that hard to remove if used daily. It does what it claims to do and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Laitinen Lape

customer_reviews.title: Love this for extra protection
customer_reviews.text: We have the traditional padded jacuzzi hot tub cover but when it rains somehow the water would get off balance so we bought this for over the top of the other cover so we can keep our water crystal clear. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Deblewis1965

customer_reviews.title: Durable for a short while
customer_reviews.text: After paying $600 several times for a new spa lid that cracks over time, I decided to try this cover. UV rays cause vinyl to deteriorate and now after just over a year using it only during the Summer, it is developing cracks. I'll try to patch them with Gorilla Tape so as to get another Summer or two out of it. Guess it's better than $600!
customer_reviews.author: David M Szakacs

customer_reviews.title: Working so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly to protect the 400$ spa cover from the sun. Hasn't rained so I do not know about the water resistance. Straps seem to work well to hold the cover in place as we do have high winds. I think some people had problems with the straps because they tried to pull them too tight. We just snugged them up enough to keep the cover from lifting off in the wind. If this lasts a few seasons I will be very happy
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Straps on the cover do not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a really good hot tub cover but the company used inferior materials for the straps. I bought the cover 4/14/19. This review is written 11/4/19. The black straps have disintegrated. The hot tub is located in Palm Springs California. So yes it gets hot and lots of sunshine but 6 months when there is a five year warranty. Amazon web site indicates I should contact the manufacturer directly. Try Googling Porch Shield the manufacturer. Not there. No way to get a hold of the manufacturer. I need the straps because it gets windy here. It is to bad because the actual cover is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for extra protection
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The 95x95 its my 90x90 tub with angled corners with a good 12 inches of side coverage. The straps make it a breeze to tighten and loosen for installation and removal. Water resistance is good and the back side of the canvas is vinyl covered to repel condensation. I’m going to treat the cover with Aerospace 303 to protect it from UV in hopes I’ll get more life out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Devilz

customer_reviews.title: Saves expensive hot tub cover from weather damage.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, looks good, protects cover and easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer prime reader

customer_reviews.title: Stained in the package
customer_reviews.text: Well this was disappointing. Just opened this hot tub cover, unfolded and proceeded to place on hot tub. It is heavily stained on a large portion of the cover that was so neatly folded up in the packaging. While it maybe durable and do the job..it looks nasty like it had coffee spilt all over it and never wiped off allowing it to stain. Certainly not what you expect from a NEW product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub cover lasted 15 months outside on my deck in full sun in Maryland. It has disintegrated in the last few months, and the plastic has torn and it has basically just fallen apart. I was hoping it would last through at least 2 winters. It did not. I will be buying a new one from a different manufacturer made with duck type canvas. The brown duck covers I use for my outdoor furniture have held up well for years. Maybe that will work also for my hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is built like a Duesenberg. Fits securely, strong fabric and fasteners, and looks good, too. It has saved me hours of cleaning and conditioning our rigid hot tub cover. This product will undoubtedly add years to the life of the rigid cover and it keeps the hot tub cooler in the summer. I expect to it to keep the temps warmer in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Agave

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, straps and handles rip off
customer_reviews.text: This product has cheap stitching which cause the handles and straps which Torc for wind to rip off the cover within 60 days. Winds of 40 mph rip cover off hot tubs, the Torc straps rip off if attempting to strap down for high winds. Straps and handles weaken with direct sun of over 100 degrees
customer_reviews.author: A.H

customer_reviews.title: looks like it will work well  Now disapointed
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking cover .... wonder how it will look in a couple of years in Arizona? changed my mind! purchased in April 2019 and in October 2019 the black tie down straps has crumbled to nothing. Less than 6 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves your expensive hard cover from sun damage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good spa cover for the money. Says it should last longer than it does, this is the second we have ordered and ith last one pretty much shredded about the 20 month mark. Saves the expensive hard cover tho, so I will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: kandiland

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, easy to secure.
customer_reviews.text: It will be interesting to see how this hold up. My hot tub is more a rectangle so I had to get a larger size. There is a lot of excess cover hanging over in places, but with the straps, it does seem secure. It is exposed to intense wind, sun, and snow so if it survives the winter, I will be quite pleased. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The stuff is very good, the material is very thick, it should be rainy. The home is broken, I bought this, the size of the house is about 84, this is just right, and there is an adjustment rope to prevent Deng blowing, not bad
customer_reviews.author: fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my hard top cover and to keep small debris from ending up in my hot tub whenever it’s opened or closed. This product is easy to put on/take off and does exactly what I need it to do. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DKfromNC

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it and stop scrolling. Make it easy on yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the beginning of last winter. I live in Colorado and it has now protection from the snow. So far so good. I would definitely recommend. I think the straps are great and make it easy to take in and off. Although I usually just leave it on. This product a must have if you are replacing your cover often.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits a smaller spa well and looks great. Good quality and keeps out the rain. Sure beats replacing an older cover because of hail damage and a couple of tears to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub isn’t under a covered area. We needed something to protect it especially during bad weather. With the adjustable straps, it fits securely and does a very good job. I wish I’d gotten one a lot sooner!
customer_reviews.author: K. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with material.
customer_reviews.text: Has this cover less than a year. it ripped at the seam as I was taking cover off spa. Clicked on the warranty link on Amazon product, no longer available. Very disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent spa cover for Pacific NW
customer_reviews.text: Working well in Western Washington so far. The material seems sturdy the straps are holding up so far. Made it through winter, interested to see how well it resists the sun.
customer_reviews.author: CDN

customer_reviews.title: Not wind proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect out hot tub cover from the wind. It was a bit longer so I thought that would do the trick but after the winds came thru the cover would not hold. This picture is after 60mph winds and the cover is ratcheted and massive rocks on it to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Silenskiene

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Good quality. Looks good. Great price. Arrived quickly. Super easy installation. Bought this because our insulated hot tub cover had a side slit for easy opening that allows rain and other small stuff to get into the tub. This is perfect for full coverage over the original cover. Still easy to open up and use tub. We like the light color and it’s held up nicely the last 9 months. However if they had a darker color we’d probably have preferred that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put on and get it cinched to fit. It has survived one mild storm. Looks like it will make it through storm season.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 85x85 size cover. My Thermo Spa Chesapeake hot tub is 87x79x38. It fits perfect. We will see how it withstands the winter and rains but so far I am happy with the purchase. Hopefully this will stop the tears that kept showing up on the main tub cover. If I had let that go on any longer I would have to buy a new one sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: bullet180

customer_reviews.title: Great price and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for a little over a year now. The cover itself has held up well, but some of the straps didn't survive summer in Phoenix. The seller sent me a brand new cover to replace the one with broken straps.
customer_reviews.author: Spliff Tannen

customer_reviews.title: High quality heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy weight, straps on all 4 sides to hold tight. Water does not penetrate, and you can open the spa cover while this is on. Highly recommend Our spa sits in hot sun this will save our top.
customer_reviews.author: joelvis

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have a new 84 in x 84 in Jacuzzi - first time hot tub owner. A friend recommended a cover to protect the heat cover from wind, rain and debris so I looked online and found this one. The cover easily fits over it the hot tub and the straps cinch it in nice and secure.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: Quality hot tub cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality hot tub cover. It protects the original thermal hot tub top from getting stained and damaged from decaying leaves, and pine needles.
customer_reviews.author: Rye4

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 1 year — no possible way to obtain a warranty replacement apparently
customer_reviews.text: **Update>> I was able to get ahold of seller and they sent me a warranty replacement. It appears to be heavy duty, Hopefully it will stand up to the Texas sun this time. Purchased April 21, 2019 appeared at first to be good quality. Tears started and I attempted to tape, they keep getting worse—- seller has no apparent way to obtain refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Good investment, ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover so far! Others with elastic dry out and are too shallow. Pop off when opening the cover. This cover drops down and does not bunch up. Lays nicely over when opening spa. Very well made and fair price. Will save my spa Grandee cover from now on with this small investment. And our spa is in the sun 24/7 in California.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny22

customer_reviews.title: Great spa cover.
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase. It fits perfectly and does the job to protect my spa from all the dirt and leaves on the windy days.
customer_reviews.author: shoptiludrop

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover for your hot tub main cover will help protect it for the weather
customer_reviews.text: Quality cover for your hot tub make sure you measure your hot tub correct it fits great
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. I am very impressed with the quality of the product. Actually a heavier material than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: walterT

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and super durable. So glad we have this to protect our hard cover!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, Fits great and is water repellant. Has held up to some extremely high winds, never moved at all. A very good buy to protect your hot tub cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & protection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Love how it hangs enough on the sides. Wish had ordered sooner to protect my prior tarp. Have it alone right now until the new heavy duty one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a few weeks but so far it’s holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Wanted to protect my hot tub cover from the sun so it would not fade during summer rays.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Keever

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this cover and I ended up throwing it away. It sagged in the middle and it just doesn't seem to be a very good cover.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was nice durable material. But it Molded with in a week and caused a lot musky smell in my cover I still can’t get out of .
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, no issues and it covers my hot tub with room to spare/ have this on top of our existing Cover. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we needed, a cheap and easy way to keep rain from seeping through an older hot tub cover that has lost its waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: Short

customer_reviews.title: Held up in High Winds
customer_reviews.text: Needed the product to cover new hot tub that did not have tie down straps installed. My family went out of town after strapping in the cover. During the time away we experienced 3 days of High Wind Advisories and the when we returned the cover was still in place as snug as when we left! We will see how it holds up under Ohio winters and summer winds but so far excellent purchase choice -
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kopecky

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will have to see how it holds up through winter storms.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well over my hot spring relay. 84 x 84 Will have to see how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent purchase. You will never regret about spending money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as description states. We wanted to try to preserve the expensive hard cover.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems very durable. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Woods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice value. Fits 85 x 85 square tub perfectly. Vents are well positioned so steam can escape near center fold of hard cover. Wish there were color options but otherwise great protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Vail

customer_reviews.title: Protection for Your Hard Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is protection for a hard cover. It collects water if used alone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So Simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and much more convenient than the old style covers.
customer_reviews.author: DSquared

customer_reviews.title: Material type
customer_reviews.text: Good size, covers well and has straps to adhere a taunt fit to keep wind from picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: VlE93

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered to cover/protect our Spa cover. Very happy with it!! Does the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Fell apart in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Slcut1058

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily, great resistance for wind lifting, good quality and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: It became brittle and tore in about 7 months! Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: b*******H

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged. Fir well and quality seems to be good
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Working so far!
customer_reviews.text: It fits and hopefully will save our actual hot rob cover. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: My spa cover size was 91”x91” and it fit very well. Liked the side straps which cinched the cover down to the spa sides. I live in an area where the summer temperatures average 95 degrees. We shall see how the cover responds to these temperatures over time.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Burdett

customer_reviews.title: Stays put in high wind
customer_reviews.text: A bit roomy for my 83x83 tub, but adjusts easily, stays put in high wind, very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Charles League

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  product.
customer_reviews.text: It fits the purpose that it was designed for. Helps keeps the heat it, protects from inclement weather and stop water seeping in through the stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Gaye Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used to use tarps to cover hot tub in the winter. This cover works much better. It is easy to put on and take off, holds up well to snow and ice and helps keep the heat in. So far it has proved very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Straps are a plus
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to protect the hard cover. It has straps on all 4 sides. That is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mily

customer_reviews.title: This Is a Giant "Shower Cap" to Protect Your Spa Lid
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very cleverly designed to cinch around the tub with straps and buckles so the wind won't send it sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Muddle

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Made from sturdy material. We also ordered one to cover our patio set. Worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia michael

customer_reviews.title: protection for the cover is excellant
customer_reviews.text: I wish the length was evenly long on all sides. I also wish it was a little more strapped down on all sides. Great item for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Muelller

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it. What’s especially nice is that it works with my cover lift. We’ll see how it holds up over theme but thumbs up for now
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, did not protect my jacuzzi cover, I should of stuck with the Cover store.
customer_reviews.author: clinard fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy cover!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to protect our hot tub and cover from the rainy Pacific Northwest!
customer_reviews.author: Shoplover

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer and heavier quality than expected. Fits my older 92" X 92" spa great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim V.

customer_reviews.title: Mock hottub cover
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this as a mock cover until I want to pay a few hundred for a replacement hard cover. It’s working well to keep it bug free and keeping the heat in decently. I am in AZ though too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can keep leaves out for about 60 days.
customer_reviews.text: Did not make through one season. Bought in July and ripped down the middle in September. It was intended to be temporary but damn. I will have to get a real cover sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and arrived in 1 day. I would recommend buying this cover to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: Service, product was as committed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as stated in the description. It fits our hot tub perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Poor Strap Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cover has been in use for less than a year and the straps to secure the cover have totally disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item fell apart or was ripped to shreds on short hail storm.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed my cover is full of holes after a short hail storm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This proud t does not fit around the suggested size.
customer_reviews.author: tenisha Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great cover protection with this secondary cover
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty material great fit for my hot tub this is a very nice cover to help protect the main cover
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: hot tub
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery from seller and great item for any one with a hot tub
customer_reviews.author: DON

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap to be true
customer_reviews.text: This broke with a small hole about a week after I purchased it forgot to return it
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Does a great job and saved me a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect.....time will tell how it holds up in sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to be made as well as my last cover.
customer_reviews.author: John Gherlone

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with this Spa Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice spa cover and it fits my spa perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Spa cover protector
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to protect expensive spa lid. Remember keep it clean. I use vlr or 303 to protect it. Like any cover in directs care is still needed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My hot tub is 84” x 84” this fits perfect. Very easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Justok55

product_meta.title: Porch Shield Square Hot Tub Cover - Waterproof Outdoor SPA Hard Cover Protector 85 x 85 inch
feature_bullets: Porch Shield outdoor SPA cover is made of 600D durable polyester fabric with an added water-resistant laminated undercoating.
Ideal for use on hot tub hard cover size up to 85''(L) x 85''(W) x 20''(H). Full coverage protects your outdoor hot tub to against sun, rain, snow, wind, dust and dirt. 3 YEAR WARRANTY.
Water-resistant backing keeps your SPA heat cover completely dry. High-level double stitching sewn, all seams sealing taped can prevent tearing, fight wind and leaks.
Air vents line with mesh barries to reduce inside condensation and wind lofting, breathable but not permeable. Heavy duty ribbon weaving handles make the cover removal easily.
Multiple locking systems: Sliding clips make adjustment for a snug fit. Quick-release buckle at the bottom keep cover securely fastened especially in severe weather.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
